thread.title: BRIEF-Alliance Resource Partners And Alliance Holdings Increase Q1 2018 Unitholder Distribution 1.0 Pct At Arlp And 0.7 Pct At Ahgp

title: BRIEF-Alliance Resource Partners And Alliance Holdings Increase Q1 2018 Unitholder Distribution 1.0 Pct At Arlp And 0.7 Pct At Ahgp

organizations.name: brief-alliance resource partners and alliance holdings

text:
Market News April 27, 2018 / 8:17 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Alliance Resource Partners And Alliance Holdings Increase Q1 2018 Unitholder Distribution 1.0 Pct At Arlp And 0.7 Pct At Ahgp Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 27 (Reuters) - Alliance Holdings GP LP:
* ALLIANCE RESOURCE PARTNERS, L.P. AND ALLIANCE HOLDINGS GP, L.P. INCREASE FIRST QUARTER 2018 UNITHOLDER DISTRIBUTION 1.0 PCT AT ARLP AND 0.7 PCT AT AHGP Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
